mapper.select: select b.holiday_date reg_date, count(a.suim_rpt_no) from (select holiday_date from sysadm_holiday where holiday_date >= (#{fromdate}) and holiday_date < (#{todate})) b left outer join top_rpt_head a on b.holiday_date = DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d') and a.reg_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and a.reg_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) group by b.holiday_date
select team_name, team_id from top_tm_bsc where team_statistics1='0' and team_type='1' order by team_order desc, team_id asc

select ifnull(rid1, 0) rid1, ifnull(rid2, 0) rid2, ifnull(rid3, 0) rid3, ifnull(rid4, 0) rid4, ifnull(rid5, 0) rid5, ifnull(rid6, 0) rid6, ifnull(rid7, 0) rid7, ifnull(rid8, 0) rid8, ifnull(rid9, 0) rid9, ifnull(rid10, 0) rid10, ifnull(rid11, 0) rid11, ifnull(rid12, 0) rid12, ifnull(rid13, 0) rid13, ifnull(rid14, 0) rid14, ifnull(rid15, 0) rid15, ifnull(rid16, 0) rid16, ifnull(rid17, 0) rid17, ifnull(rid18, 0) rid18, ifnull(rid19, 0) rid19, ifnull(rid20, 0) rid20, ifnull(rid21, 0) rid21, ifnull(rid22, 0) rid22, ifnull(rid23, 0) rid23, ifnull(rid24, 0) rid24, ifnull(rid25, 0) rid25, ifnull(rid26, 0) rid26, ifnull(rid27, 0) rid27, ifnull(rid28, 0) rid28, ifnull(rid29, 0) rid29, ifnull(rid30, 0) rid30, ifnull(rid31, 0) rid31, ifnull(rid_sum, 0) rid_sum, ifnull(rid_sum_y, 0) rid_sum_y, ifnull(rid_m, 0) rid_m, ifnull(rid_y, 0) rid_y, ifnull(rid_mi, 0) rid_mi from (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid1 from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and suim_rpt_state != '3' and reg_date >= unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(#{s_tmpTday}, interval 31 day)) and reg_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(#{s_tmpTday}, interval 30 day)) and suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) )a, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid2 from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and suim_rpt_state!='3' and reg_date >= unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(#{s_tmpTday}, interval 30 day)) and reg_date < (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) )a2, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid29 from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and suim_rpt_state!='3' and reg_date >= unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(#{s_tmpTday}, interval (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid_sum_y from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and reg_date >= unix_timestamp(#{tmpYdayF}) and reg_date < unix_timestamp(${tmpYdayT}) and suim_rpt_state <'3' )a6, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid_m from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(${tmpMdayF}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(#{tmpMdayT}) )a7, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid_y from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{tmpYdayF}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(${tmpYdayT}) )a8, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid_mi from top_rpt_head where team_id = ${tmpTI} and suim_rpt_state < '2' )a9, (select count(suim_rpt_no) rid_sum from top_rpt_head where team_id = #{tmpTI} and reg_date >= unix_timestamp(DATE_ADD(#{tmpMdayF}, interval 1 day)) and reg_date < unix_timestamp(#{tmpMdayT}) and suim_rpt_state != '3' and suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) )a10;
